pserver.pservlets

Class Stereotypes

  • java.lang.Object
    • pserver.pservlets.Stereotypes
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    pserver.pservlets.PService

    public class Stereotypes
extends java.lang.Object
implements pserver.pservlets.PService
    Contains all necessary methods for the management of Stereotypes mode of PServer.

      • service

        public int service(pserver.data.VectorMap parameters,
          java.lang.StringBuffer response,
          pserver.data.DBAccess dbAccess)
        Creates a service for Stereotypes' mode when a command is sent to PServer. The command is identified from its name and proper methods for the management of this command are called. A response code is produced depending on results.
        Specified by:
        service in interface pserver.pservlets.PService
        Parameters:
        parameters - The parameters needed for this service.
        response - The response string that is created.
        dbAccess - The database manager.
        Returns:
        The value of response code.
